overview.en: Centaur (CNTR) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Centaur has a current supply of 6,000,000,000 with 867,083,333 in circulation. The last known price of Centaur is 0.01846173 USD and is down -3.33 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 5 active market(s) with $1,430,505.10 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://cntr.finance/.
